1.title: Stage 1: The Battle Begins
1.plot: From Montego Bay, Jamaica. Forget everything you know about golf. On this course, the holes are over 700 yards. Par is measured with a stopwatch. The hazard is a jungle. And the route you take is up to you. It's a test of skill, speed, and strategy, as eight teams of two race for survival. Don't miss a moment as golf goes extreme.

2.title: Stage 2: First Elimination
2.plot: From Montego Bay, Jamaica, the pressure is turned up all the way in Stage 2 as the first team out of eight is eliminated. This stage is filled with thrills, spills and surprises as the threat of elimination becomes a harsh reality.

3.title: Stage 3: Survival of the Fittest
3.plot: From Montego Bay, Jamaica, emotions run high between teammates, and mental and physical endurance will be put to the test as four teams fight to stay out of elimination. And in the end, time will run out for another unlucky team.

4.title: Stage 4: Time Is Ticking
4.plot: From Montego Bay, Jamaica, teams will be forced to join together to avoid elimination and an unfortunate break could mean the end for one team.

5.title: Stage 5: Halfway Home
5.plot: From Montego Bay, Jamaica, the remaining teams are halfway to their goal of winning $100,000 in cash and prizes. Now the competition is at the highest level, where one mistake can send them home. For one team, a new competition strategy paves the way to elimination.

6.title: Stage 6: Final Four
6.plot: From Montego Bay, Jamaica, it is down to the final four teams of Altered Course: Montego Bay, and head to head matchups will determine which teams stamp their ticket to Stage 7. Tensions rise and tears fall with $100,000 in cash and prizes well within reach.

7.title: Stage 7: Semifinals
7.plot: From Montego Bay, Jamaica, mere seconds will determine which of the three remaining teams will fight for the chance to play in the championship match.

8.title: Stage 8: The Finale
8.plot: From Montego Bay, Jamaica, after looking back to watch how it all unfolded, two surviving teams battle it out for a grand prize worth $100,000, and the coveted Altered Course championship medal.

imdb.plot outline: Eight teams of two compete in a fast paced golf competition that will test both their golf and fitness levels. The teams will have to look for short-cuts to get from a "re-imagined" tee-to-green where they will negotiate 100 foot elevation changes all on foot. Hitting blind shots and navigating dangerous terrain, the scoring will be a combination of time and strokes, so talent, strategy, teamwork, speed and agility are the keys to success.
imdb.title: Altered Course
plot: Eight teams of two compete in a fast paced golf competition that will test both their golf and fitness levels. The teams will have to look for short-cuts to get from a "re-imagined" tee-to-green where they will negotiate 100 foot elevation changes all on foot. Hitting blind shots and navigating dangerous terrain, the scoring will be a combination of time and strokes, so talent, strategy, teamwork, speed and agility are the keys to success.
